name: Neverwinter Nights 2: Platinum
summary: Neverwinter Nights 2 Platinum Edition is the ultimate RPG experience, the complete collection of one of the most popular role-player adventures of our time. The Platinum Edition includes: The Award Winning Neverwinter Nights 2; Two Hit expansion packs, Mask of the Betrayer and Storm of Zehir; Premium Game modules from the developers of Neverwinter Nights 2; Bioware’s Ayrira Toolset for easy mod creation; All patches and updates released to date. This is the entire Neverwinter Nights 2 catalog, encompassing over 100 hours of solo gameplay and limitless online campaigns!
